author: leosimons
msg: * pygump/python/gump/model/__init__.py: add some code to SvnRepository which removes trailing slashes on urls.
* pygump/python/gump/plugins/updater.py: fix bug from typo during svn up.
* fixture/metadata/profile.xml: use 'path' on the '<module' instead of 'subdir as that's what is supported by the code.

author: ekoneil
msg: Re-moving the shared flow.  There are deployment problems when the shared flow simply moves from web/ to src/ presumably because the webapp build source path is wrong.
